Package imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.nonlinear

Class SphereMapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.nonlinear.SphereMapping
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Mapping2D, java.lang.Cloneable
    @Deprecated
public class SphereMapping
extends java.lang.Object
implements Mapping2D
    Deprecated.
    A non-linear mapping that produces a spherical distortion. The transformation is implicitly inverted, i.e., maps target to source image coordinates. Note: This class has been deprecated and substituted by an ImageJ plugin.
